casebody.data:
LOCKLEAR
v.
CUMMINGS, et al. 202A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 19, 2017 Walter L. Hart, IV, Attorney at Law, for Locklear, Marjorie C. David D. Ward, Attorney at Law, Katherine Hilkey-Boyatt, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Matthew Gambale, Wilmington, for Cummings, Matthew S. (M.D.), et al. Robert A. Ford, Attorney at Law, Demetrius Worley Berry, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Southeastern Regional Medical Center.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of September 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of September 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 18th day of October 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
